TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Mali, title = Mali, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mali} }

S.FORM: Mali hya' ga cyux maki' tay 17 00 N, 4 00 W na Xweco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 1,240,192 sq km (maki' tay 24ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 1,220,190 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 20,002 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 17,467,108. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 34.10% , lhlahuy hya' ga 10.20%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 55.70%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Bamako. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 22 na tay mqiru' byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Ibrahim Boubacar Keïta, aring ryax 4 squ byacing tay 9 sa kawas 2013 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Mali hya' ga cyox maki' tay 17 00 N, 4 00 W na Xweco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 1,240,192 sq km (maki' tay 24ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 1,220,190 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 20,002 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 17,467,108. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 34.10% , lhlahoy hya' ga 10.20%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 55.70%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Bamako. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 22 na tay mqiro' byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Ibrahim Boobacar Keïta, aring ryax 4 sqo byacing tay 9 sa kawas 2013 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
